name: DOTZ
description: We are more than just a meme coin! Our vision is to support local mom-and-pop shops and small businesses without any upfront costs by leveraging our Dotz coin. By partnering with these local businesses, we will offer discounts to Dotz coin holders, creating a mutually beneficial situation for both consumers and business owners. Dotz Coin removes the need for up-front advertising expenses, enabling companies to advertise their goods and services without worrying about money
